Date: 23.09.2006 08.10.2005 of
Genre: Animation | Action, Angst, Fantasy, gunfights, Horror, Shounen, Swordplay, Vampires, Violence

Synopsis:
Saya Otonashi lives in Okinawa with his adoptive family, George Miyagusuku, a retired military officer, and his two brothers, Kai and Riku. But Saya only memories of the last year of his life and does not know who he is or what happened before moving in with George. A strange character follows close, the shadows begin to become darker and the time comes when Saya, with a bloody sword in his hand, must fight the monstrous bats, nightmarish creatures that feed on human blood. But someone else watching Saya steps of: Red Shield organization and also the group of the five arrows, two factions with particular purposes and secret intrigues. Saya must fight or die. His awakening will be the nightmare of bats.
